Texto: 
non-focal neurological exam
the lesion was coiled
chest ct images demonstrate a right lower lobe peripheral pulmonary nodule in association with a tortuous vessel leading to the nodule
pulmonary arteriovenous malformation (pavm)
pulmonary avm
lung cancer
bronchial mucoid obstruction
tia-like symptoms; nodule noted on recent cxr
